nodes.text: The MPO-1400 Star Cruiser, also known as the Chandrilan Class I starship, was a class of Star Cruiser in service during the New Republic Era, manufactured by the Corellian Engineering Corporation. One Star Cruiser was the Halcyon, which was operated by Chandrila Star Line. It was roughly twice as large as a CR90 corvette, and it had thirteen engines.
The MPO-1400 Star Cruiser Halcyon is the setting for the Walt Disney Star Wars-themed luxury hotel set to be located in Florida.
